name: evo-lib
description: A collection of RiotJS web-app components created and maintained by Evosus Inc.

scripts.deploy: gcloud app deploy --project lib-prod && slackcli -t xoxp-2756762780-9320609456-25976903319-f75ea8dc81 -h dev-builds -m 'Deployed updates to Evosus Components Library on App Engine DEV URL: https://lib.evosus.com/' && slackcli -t xoxp-2756762780-9320609456-25976903319-f75ea8dc81 -h dev-service-pro -m 'Deployed updates to Evosus Components Library on App Engine DEV URL: https://lib.evosus.com/'
scripts.commit-wip: git add . && git commit . -m 'WIP' && git push

author: Evosus, Inc
